ALARM_HIGH.description: Default setting for new browser views, for the High alarm (triggered when BG crosses BG_TARGET_TOP). ('on' or 'off')

ALARM_LOW.description: Default setting for new browser views, for the Low alarm (triggered when BG crosses BG_TARGET_BOTTOM). ('on' or 'off')

ALARM_TIMEAGO_URGENT.description: Default setting for new browser views, for an urgent alarm when CGM data hasn't been received in the number of minutes set in ALARM_TIMEAGO_URGENT_MINS. ('on' or 'off')

ALARM_TIMEAGO_URGENT_MINS.description: Default setting for new browser views, for the number of minutes since the last CGM reading to trigger an ALARM_TIMEAGO_URGENT alarm.

ALARM_TIMEAGO_WARN.description: Default setting for new browser views, for a warning alarm when CGM data hasn't been received in the number of minutes set in ALARM_TIMEAGO_WARN_MINS. ('on' or 'off')

ALARM_TIMEAGO_WARN_MINS.description: Default setting for new browser views, for the number of minutes since the last CGM reading to trigger an ALARM_TIMEAGO_WARN alarm.

ALARM_TYPES.description: 'simple' and/or 'predict'. Simple alarms trigger when BG crosses the various thresholds set below. Predict alarms use a formula that forecasts where the BG is going based on its trend. You will *not* get warnings when crossing the BG thresholds set below when using the predict type.

ALARM_URGENT_HIGH.description: Default setting for new browser views, for the Urgent High alarm (triggered when BG crosses BG_HIGH). ('on' or 'off')

ALARM_URGENT_LOW.description: Default setting for new browser views, for the Urgent Low alarm (triggered when BG crosses BG_LOW). ('on' or 'off')

API_SECRET.description: A passphrase that must be at least 12 characters long.

BG_HIGH.description: Urgent High BG threshold, triggers the ALARM_URGENT_HIGH alarm. Must be set in mg/dL, even if you use mmol/L (multiply a mmol/L value by 18 to change it to mg/dl).

BG_LOW.description: Urgent Low BG threshold, triggers the ALARM_URGENT_LOW alarm. Must be set in mg/dL, even if you use mmol/L (multiply a mmol/L value by 18 to change it to mg/dl).

BG_TARGET_BOTTOM.description: Low BG threshold, triggers the ALARM_LOW alarm. Must be set in mg/dL, even if you use mmol/L (multiply a mmol/L value by 18 to change it to mg/dl).

BG_TARGET_TOP.description: High BG threshold, triggers the ALARM_HIGH alarm. Must be set in mg/dL, even if you use mmol/L (multiply a mmol/L value by 18 to change it to mg/dl).

BRIDGE_PASSWORD.description: Your Dexcom account password, to receive CGM data from the Dexcom Share service. Also make sure to include 'bridge' in your ENABLE line.

BRIDGE_SERVER.description: If you are bridging from the Dexcom Share service, and are anywhere *outside* the US, change this to EU. ('US' or 'EU')

BRIDGE_USER_NAME.description: Your Dexcom account username, to receive CGM data from the Dexcom Share service. Also make sure to include 'bridge' in your ENABLE line.

CUSTOM_TITLE.description: The display name for the Nightscout site. Appears in the upper left of the main view. Often set to the name of the T1.

DISABLE.description: Used to disable default features. Must be a space-delimited list.

DISPLAY_UNITS.description: Preferred BG units for the site:'mg/dl' or 'mmol'. (Note that it is *not* 'mmol/L')

ENABLE.description: Plugins to enable for your site. Must be a space-delimited list. Include the word 'bridge' here if you are receiving data from the Dexcom Share service.

INSECURE_USE_HTTP.description: If set to true, the site will redirect requests over http to https. If set to false requests over http will not be redirected and will be served insecurely.

MAKER_ANNOUNCEMENT_KEY.description: If using the Maker plugin, this is your optional Announcement Key. Also make sure to include the word 'maker' in your ENABLE string.

MAKER_KEY.description: If using the Maker plugin, this is your Secret Key. Also make sure to include the word 'maker' in your ENABLE string.

MONGO_COLLECTION.description: The mLab collection where CGM data is stored.

NIGHT_MODE.description: Default setting for new browser views, for whether Night Mode should be enabled. ('on' or 'off')

PUSHOVER_ANNOUNCEMENT_KEY.description: If using the Pushover service, this is your optional Announcement Key.

PUSHOVER_API_TOKEN.description: If using the Pushover service, this is your API Token.

PUSHOVER_USER_KEY.description: If using the Pushover service, this is your optional Pushover User Key.

SECURE_CSP.description: Enables a Content Security Policy header.

SECURE_HSTS_HEADER.description: Enables an HSTS (HTTP Strict Transport Security) header.

SECURE_HSTS_HEADER_INCLUDESUBDOMAINS.description: Adds `includeSubDomains` to the HSTS header. This header is required for `preload`.

SECURE_HSTS_HEADER_PRELOAD.description: Adds `preload` to the HSTS header, adding your site to the HSTS preloaded list. Requires SECURE_HSTS_HEADER_INCLUDESUBDOMAINS to be true.

SHOW_RAWBG.description: Default setting for new browser views, for the display of raw CGM data (if available). ('always', 'never', or 'noise')

THEME.description: Default setting for new browser views, for the color theme of the CGM graph. ('default', 'colors', or 'colorblindfriendly')

TIME_FORMAT.description: Default setting for new browser views, for the time mode. ('12' or '24')
